Not supposed to take pictures in here.

comment.author: 8093847@N04
comment._content: @FirehawkNS--The Library is holding an open house this coming Monday, Feb. 18, and photographers are welcome. This is a special event they usually hold twice a year and a great opportunity to take pictures in the Main Reading Room. Take a look at the set description for more information.

comment._content: Bucket List: U.S. Library of Congress is where I wish to spend the rest of my tireless life until my last breath, then donate all my useful body parts to the needy.
